comment: George is my favorite college professor I've ever had. He is so nice and will work with you. He can have some ADHD moments, but it's not bad. He is very passionate about making sure his students succeed. 10/10 would recommend.

He's a really nice professor.  You can tell that he cares about each student. Still, there's a LOT of reading; at least one chapter of each of the three books per week. He also demands long papers that require much time and thought, but he does give good feedback. But you will get a good grade if you participate and do well on the other two things.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Awesome professor! Probably the most intelligent professor I've had in his field. Take him if you want to learn AND get an A!
Most helpful and friendly professor I've had yet, not to mention extremely intelligent.
